abstract: Students at Cardiff University in London begin petition to prevent Australian feminist author Germaine Greer from speaking there because of her negative attitude toward transgender women; university officials reject effort as academic censorship.
lead_paragraph: Officials at Cardiff University cited the importance of free speech after rejecting a student petition to ban a campus lecture by the feminist author Germaine Greer.

headline.main: Cardiff University Rejects Bid to Bar Germaine Greer
headline.print_headline: British University Denies Student Petition to Bar Author

snippet: Officials at Cardiff University cited the importance of free speech after rejecting a student petition to ban a campus lecture by the feminist author Germaine Greer.
